item.title: Monitoring Disk Space Across Servers Using Node Exporter and Prometheus
item.description: Monitoring Disk Space Across Servers Using Node Exporter and Prometheus Ever had that sinking feeling when your server runs out of disk space at 3 AM? I have—more times than I’d like to admit. After one too many midnight emergencies, I decided to automate disk space monitoring using Prometheus, Node Exporter, and Grafana. Here’s how you can set it up too, complete with alerts and pretty dashboards to keep your sanity intact.
